name: @shgysk8zer0/js-utils
description: A collection of npm packages, such as ESLint and Rollup

scripts.test: npm run lint:js && npm run build
scripts.version:bump:patch: npm version --no-git-tag-version patch && npm run create:lock
scripts.version:bump:minor: npm version --no-git-tag-version minor && npm run create:lock
scripts.version:bump:major: npm version --no-git-tag-version major && npm run create:lock
